name: TimeSparrow
0:
”Alexa, open Time Sparrow.”
”Alexa, ask TimeSparrow to create a time entry.”
”Alexa, ask Time Sparrow to create a time entry for today.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: time sparrow
Developer Terms of Use
des: TimeSparrow makes it easy for lawyers to enter their time. Simply tell Alexa what you worked on, and when. Alexa will transcribe your time entry, and will save it to the correct date on TimeSparrow.
